sense.gloss: very, greatly, much, to a large extent, quite
just about to, almost, very nearly

sdata.j: |よほど|↑重要↑↓じゅうよう↓な↑用向↑↓ようむ↓きでやってきたことが、↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑顔色↑↓かおいろ↓で↑分↑↓わ↓かった。
sdata.e: I could tell by the look on his face that he had come on very important business.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はその↑話↑↓はなし↓が|よほど|↑面白↑↓おもしろ↓かったようだ。
sdata.e: It seems that he was very much amused by the story.

sdata.j: ↑父↑↓ちち↓は↑今年↑↓ことし↓↑喜寿↑↓きじゅ↓を↑迎↑↓むか↓えたが、わたしなんかより|よほど|エネルギッシュだ。
sdata.e: My father celebrated his seventieth birthday this year, but he's more energetic than I am.
